resources.string: "E tatau ona faataga le faatagaga o nofoaga"
E tatau ona e talia le faatagaga mo Securitly e galue ai
"Talofa, o au o Ema, ua mate lau maa."
E tatau ona iloa e Securitly lou nofoaga i taimi uma

"E te manao e faaaga lou nofoaga?
Alu ile Faatonu -> Apps -> Securitly -> Faataga i taimi uma le nofoaga.

Ona toe amata lea o Securitly"
"Auina atu le feau faafuasei pe a maualuga le maa"
"E te mautinoa e te manao e toe seti faamaumauga faaletonu?"
Ole pasene maualalo ole maa ole 2%
Ole pasene maualuga ole maa ole 100%
"E te manao e tape lenei fesootaiga mai lau lisi o fesootaiga?"

1. E tatau ona iloa e Securitly lou nofoaga i taimi uma. Ina ia faia lena mea, alu i lau masini faʻatulagaina -> apps -> Securitly -> Faʻatagaga ma sui le faʻatagaga nofoaga i le "Faʻataga taimi uma".
"2. Aua le faamalosia tapuni Securitly. A leai, o le a le lafo lau feau faafuasei i au fesootaiga."
3. Matou te le fautuaina e te setiina le maualuga o le maa lea e te lafoina ai lau feʻau faʻafuaseʻi i le 1 poʻo le 2%, aua e ono tape lau masini aʻo leʻi lafoina le feʻau.

O lenei app na faia e le 5 tamaiti aʻoga mai le Technological Institute of Laguna, Mekisiko. O lenei poloketi na amata o se manatu na matou sauni e faʻataunuʻu, ma faʻatasi ai ma le matou faufautua, inisinia Gerardo, na matou faʻataunuʻuina. Faatasi ai ma lenei app matou te faʻamoemoe e fai sina sao i le tulaga o loʻo i ai nei i le lalolagi.

Ole nofoaga mulimuli ole masini ole:
latitu:
40.776570
umi: -73.969979
Central Park West Historic District
Niu Ioka, 10024, EE. UU.
E le mafai e Securitly ona galue ona e le\i fa\atagaina le "Auina atu SMS".

E le mafai e Securitly ona galue ona e le\o fa\atagaina le fa\atagaga o le "Tulaga i taimi uma". E tatau ona iloa e Securitly lou nofoaga ina ia mafai ai ona auina atu lou nofoaga iloa mulimuli i au fesoʻotaʻiga filifilia
"Sa i ai se faaletonu i le mauaina o le nofoaga faavasegaina o lenei masini"
Aua le faʻaalia le "nofoaga manaʻomia" faʻaalia pe a amata Securitly
